testcase.name: Response time is less than 1000ms
testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: b7c7adbb-e875-4370-873c-46c09e209776. Collection name: OpenChargeMapAPI. Request name: Get POIs. Test description: Response time is less than 1000ms. Error message: expected 1806 to be below 1000. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected 1806 to be below 1000 at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:3:1).

testcase.name: Response data contains an array of POI objects
Each POI contains mandatory fields ID, AddressInfo, NumberOfPoints
Response contains an array of 5 POI objects
POIs are within 10km of specific coordinates
Response contains array of ChargerTypes with ID and Title fields
Response contains array of StatusTypes with ID and Title fields
Response contains array of CheckinStatusTypes with ID and Title fields
Response contains array of ConnectionTypes with ID and Title fields
Response contains array of CurrentTypes with ID and Title fields
Response contains array of DataProviders with ID and Title fields
Response contains array of Operators with ID and Title fields
